TopicTitle: [AAR] BaseCamp- A Journey to Space -- WARNING: IMAGE HEAVY

Articles.Content: I wanien ro ask- how did you get kwrocketry propulsions to look like those not-stock ones? You know The enhanced visuals mod.

I would like to propose an expedition to the Foundry orbiting Minmus by a B9K-controlled probe to analyze the objects produced by it rapidly and efficiently. The probe would assume an orbit with the same SMA as the Foundry, but would maintain a general position either A: behind it, B: in front of it, or C: in a pseudo-orbit of it.

Seems like a good mission plan- but Jeb is already on his way out there. Maybe he will rendezvous withe the probe and then with the artifact?

Scratch that, engineers blew up world, loading backups.

If I had a nickel for the number of times I have caused this, I would have 3.25$.

Ah and i forgot to say- another great chapter!

Thanks! I spend a lot of time on them, so it's nice to get feedback.

I wanien ro ask- how did you get kwrocketry propulsions to look like those not-stock ones? You know The enhanced visuals mod.

There is a link on the hot rockets forum to a guy who wrote module manager cfg files for the kw engines. I don't have an exact link, but you should be able to find it.

Oh guys- guess what?

WHEEEEE!!!!
Wheeeeeeee!!!!

Seems like a good mission plan- but Jeb is already on his way out there. Maybe he will rendezvous withe the probe and then with the artifact?

If I had a nickel for the number of times I have caused this, I would have 3.25$.

Thanks! I spend a lot of time on them, so it's nice to get feedback.

There is a link on the hot rockets forum to a guy who wrote module manager cfg files for the kw engines. I don't have an exact link, but you should be able to find it.

Ahhhh... i tried to do the kwrocketry, but i can only find one thing that adds fx for one engine, and i don't really know where to even place it. :/
Hooray for a KSO mission!

Just a little thing I did when I was testing paramecimkid's jumpdrive.

(if you are interested, it uses ALL YOUR ELECTRIC POWER, and only works in same SOI)

To test it- I built a torch-ship!

(Disclamer- it did not accelerate the whole way anywhere, but it could accelerate at 7.5gs, so it was a bit overpowered.)

Kerbin to duna- 6 days 4 hours.

For amiance, listen to this

while reading.

on aerobreaking approach

This is the ship, the beautiful "Parasitic Hyena"

14 km/s orbit speed. You don't want to know the speed I was relative to the ground.

Note: Periapsis is at 7 km. I really hope I have enough speed, or I am going to plough a crater into duna...

Ground's coming up fast...

Oh. There's the atmosphere.

Rather alot of fire here.

And gimbals are not enough to keep it from flipping.

And tumbling.

Leaving the atmosphere...

And goodbye Duna!

Full throttle for course correction.

I survived, and now... To Jool and a slingshot out of the system!

(Interception in 79 days.)

....

79 days later... Jool is in sight.

Just an idea of what the trajectory is on the map.

Jool is coming up very fast...

Speed is rather high...

Nice shot of laythe

Jool is getting big...

Speed at 10 km/sec

Had to boost because my periapsis suddenly dropped into the planet- speed upon entering: 20 km/s

Hitting the atmosphere was like hitting several walls though a wall factory- 20 g of deceleration for several seconds.

And tumbling. Again.

Also on fire.

And now leaving jool.

Sort of...

With it's speed halved, the Hyena is on an escape trajectory "up" Out of the kerbal system.

Time to test the Jump-Drive!

I left a beacon-equipped station in Kerbin orbit, and I planned this so that the station and ship have a clean line-of-sight for the travel.

Almost ready!!!

Nothing happened. And my only fuel source- electric charge- got drained completely.

Oh, and my trajectory? It is now the direction I was pointing, at the speed I was going- so escape velocity out and away from the sun.

It took a 5-minute burn to set the orbit so it would orbit back to kerbol.

******

Jeb: This is why we test- so you won't be the poor souls on that ship, lost in deep space indefinitely.

Kirlak: Stop talking to your mirror and help me with this telescope data.

...what.

...no, seriously. What.

WAIT! You have planet facotry CE! I saw you posting! Maybe you will create a little asteroid with practically no gravity (waaay smaller than Gilly about 1 km in radius) to kerblas inspect it or something?

...what.

...no, seriously. What.

I play sometimes without an epic story- and in this case I was testing a mod.

WAIT! You have planet facotry CE! I saw you posting! Maybe you will create a little asteroid with practically no gravity (waaay smaller than Gilly about 1 km in radius) to kerblas inspect it or something?

I had to evchange that for kraig's other planet mod due to stability issues.

Although there will be asteroids in the future.

From here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33713-20-Asteroids-!!!!
I just went over all of the old A Journey to Space stories and I realized that I facilitated the creation of SWARM in the old universe... I sorta hate myself now for that.

I just went over all of the old A Journey to Space stories and I realized that I facilitated the creation of SWARM in the old universe... I sorta hate myself now for that.

A good hero makes a good story, a decent villain makes a great story- and the SWARM is a great threat, and a good villain.

Don't bee too hard on yourself.

I play sometimes without an epic story- and in this case I was testing a mod.

I had to evchange that for kraig's other planet mod due to stability issues.

Although there will be asteroids in the future.

From here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33713-20-Asteroids-!!!!

One of photos in that page, gave me an idea... I want to build a base! On Mun! Or anything lese, but I WANT TO!

A good hero makes a good story, a decent villain makes a great story- and the SWARM is a great threat, and a good villain.

Don't bee too hard on yourself.

Hey, I didn't mean what I said literally.
Are you still alive?
I posted something i shouldn't... edited it so nobody sees it... and now i can't delete it!

Are you still alive?

?

I posted something i shouldn't... edited it so nobody sees it... and now i can't delete it!

?

Update will be tonight.

Hey, I didn't mean what I said literally.

I guessed- but I really owe you guys. The story would not be as convoluted as it is without the SWARM, and they are great villains from my perspective.
I do have to agree with you on that point, Mek. Also, it's fun trying to anticipate SWARM's next move.

Just a note-

Update is postponed (until monday eve) due to work. It got in the way- I have pictures prepared, but I need to sleep now if I want to get to class in the morning.

So- here's a picture to whet your appetite!

?

?

Update will be tonight.

I guessed- but I really owe you guys. The story would not be as convoluted as it is without the SWARM, and they are great villains from my perspective.

Actually... don't even ask... don't even look at what i posted.

....

And what are those "wings" anyway?
Those are solar sails, I think.
I also thought but they seem too.. small. For me.
Definitely solar sails. Solar wind in the Kerbol system has to be MUCH stronger than in our system, so I'd think that they'd be much more effective.

Those are solar sails, I think.
I also thought but they seem too.. small. For me.
Definitely solar sails. Solar wind in the Kerbol system has to be MUCH stronger than in our system, so I'd think that they'd be much more effective.

No. They are not.

I will upload the chapter when Imgur lets me LOG IN.

Here's the message I get:

Error (0)

Sorry! There was an error (code: 0) retrieving the page you requested. Try refreshing or double checking your URL. If you think this error is an error, try contacting us about it.

Chapter 3- Stations and Shuttles

Jeb: Make sure these dials do not hit the red, alright?

Kirlak: I have not forgotten yet Jeb.

Bill: We can handle it.

Bob: We will keep you appraised of any new material.

MC: Has Jeb left yet?

Jeb: No.

MC: Good. We are launching a probe to investigate the gravioli anomaly. We have altered the plan a little...

Jeb: How so?

MC: You will be rendezvousing with a station, and pushing it into Minnimus orbit.

Jeb: Rodger MC. Give me a minute to decouple and drift to a safe distance.

MC: Godspeed Jeb.

Bill: Happy Flying!

****

A few minutes later.

****

Jeb: Decoupled from the station. Drifting to safe distance.

Jeb: Burning for rendezvous.

Jeb: Burn complete. I think spaceflight is mostly waiting....

****

1 nap later.

****

B9k: Jeb!

Jeb:zzzz.... What? Oh. MC- we are beginning docking procedures.

MC: Right on-time Jeb.

Jeb: Is it just me, or does this station look... Small.

MC: It's just a habitation area really- life support and power.

Jeb: Docking now. Inflating module...

Jeb: I have one question MC- Why is there a coffee stain in the module?

MC: Um....

*****

Before the nap

*****

MC: B9k- this is a B9 probe- please don't break it.

B9k: I have not broken anything since I have been upgraded to version 0.23.

MC: Good. Still- don't break it.

B9k: I won't.

MC: Good.

MC: Launch in 3. 2. 1. 0. B9k- you are free to launch.

B9k: Geronimo!

B9k: 2k meters.

MC: Testing front camera...

MC: Camera test is a success- your connection is loud and clear B9k.

B9k: That's good. Is there a secondary memory core in here?

MC: Yes. You requested it to keep from going crazy on the journey.

B9k1: Hi!

B9k2: Hi! Decoupling side boosters soon.

B9k1: Indeed. Decoupling...

B9k1: So... You up for a game of chess?

B9k2: I thought you would never ask.

B9k2: Ah. We are cruising. Bishop takes knight.

B9k1: Queen takes knight.

B9k1: Fuel is not flowing properly.

B9k2: Indeed- MC, we are activating the nuclear stage early.

MC: Activate containment before the engine.

B9k1: Containment activated. Jettisoning...

B9k2: Circularized. Checkmate in 3 moves.

B9k1: Oh... Ok.

B9k1: Want to play again?

B9k2: Sure. Burn for minnimus intercept in 10 seconds.

B9k1: Great. Mate in 27.

B9k2: WHAT?

B9k1: I can predict what you are going to do after that last match. Mate in 27.

B9k2: That's cheating!

B9k1: How long is this burn?

B9k2: Long. Very, very, long....

****

Halfway through Jeb's nap

****

B9k2: I did not see that coming.

B9k1: Want to play again?

B9k2: No. Let's play Battleship.

B9k1: InfiniteDice Rules?

B9k2: Sure. Fine-tune burn in 3. 2. 1. Burning...

B9k2: Are you done placing your ships yet?

B9k1: Yes.

*****

As Jeb was waking up...

*****

B9k1: And there goes my sub.

B9k2: HA!

B9k1: Now I fire my railcannons on the battleship. Hit A7, and B8.

B9k2: Ah. We are coming up on the circularization burn.

B9k1: Maneuvering to rendezvous with the anomaly.

B9k2: Recon planes to D14 and E7.

B9k1: Burning again...

****

When Jeb is asking about the coffee stain...

****

B9k1: MC, we are approaching the anomaly. No anomalous gravioli readings at 1 km range.

B9k2: Burning for equilibrium.

B9k1: Burn complete.

MC: Good. Investigate the artifact please.

B9k1/2: On it.

B9k1: It looks very... Simple.

MC: It does not match any known SWARM designs.

B9k1: It's decoupling...

B9k2: NBo visible weapons.

B9k1: What.

B9k2: I am reading relativistic distortion between the front and back of the wings.

B9k1: An induction/differential sail? Camsmir Tech?

B9k2: That's an unproven theory- until now.

MC: You are coming in loud and clear on telemetry and sensor data. Camera Check?

B9k1: WARNING- WE ARE BEING PULSED BY RADIATION.

B9k2: Radiation is high-band, intersecting in-an-out of matter without visible sensitivity.

B9k1: Hypothesis: The artifact is scanning us.

UNKNOWN: Vessel- Kerbal Design- Would you like to communicate with Foundry d4Rk?

B9k1: Radio communication?

B9k2: Seems to be. It is the only pulsing band now.

UNKNOWN: Would you like to communicate with Foundry d4Rk? Y/N?

B9k1: MC, please advise.

MC: Transmit Y.

B9k2: I think it is supposed to be "Yes".

B9k1: Transmitting Y.

UNKNOWN: Please dock onto a docking port that fits.

B9k1: Isolating cognitive circuits.

B9k2: Firewalls set up. Mc, are we cleared to dock?

MC: Yes. You are.

B9k1: Foundry-

Foundry: Foundry d4Rk.

B9k2: Yes. What information do you have relating to the SWARM?

Foundry: Searching... Complete. SWARM entities known as hostile, and aggressive factions will be destroyed via nanoscopic deconstruction.

B9k1: Thats sounds rather scary.

B9k1: MC, we are docked. We now have access to... Wow. This artifact is a self-replicating vehicle with orbital construction components!

B9k2: Also the ability to deconstruct vehicles on the nanotech level.

B9k1: There are tons of vehicles this thing can construct... We are going to need some specialists to help start filtering and understanding these plans.

MC: Some specialists are on the way.

*****

After MC said "Um..." to Jeb

*****

Jeb: B9k, are we calculated for our min-shot?

B9k: Yes Jeb.

B9k: Changing inclination for rendezvous.

B9k: Interception burn for Minnimus.

Jeb: I love these long journeys. Wake me when we are getting close.

B9k: Sure Jeb.

*****

Another Nap later

*****

Jeb: *Yawn* I Love the hab! It's so soft and squishy!

B9k: We are getting close.

B9k: You need to be in the Cockpit before the burn begins.

Jeb: Fine....

Jeb: Now we are in orbit. What next?

MC: Just wait.

Jeb: I can do that.

********

Back on Kerbin, the team of experts is in the KSO Resolute-Class shuttle.

********

Dr. Gromoslaw (PHD in engineering): Did ve haf to get into ze shuttle before azzembly?

B9k: Yes, Doctor.

Johngas (Pilot): KSP Tower, this is the shuttle Nuclear Lawsuit, requesting permission to launch.

MC: Lawsuit, you are clear to launch.

Johngas: Beginning countdown.

Johngas: 5. 4. 3. 2. 1. Firing Engine!

*THOOOM*

Gromoslaw: I should not have taken a front seat...

Dr. Sheptop (PHD in nanotechnology): This had better be worth it.

Dr. Comand (PHD in astrospace engineering): Ah... The relaxing feel of a gravity turn.

Sheptop: I am going to be sick.

Dr. Wilger (Medical Doctor): Have this bag.

Johngas: Disconnecting from bottom stage in 3. 2. 1. Now.

Johngas: Ascent engine firing. We are on -route to orbit.

Wilger: I look forward to dawn in space.

Johngas: Circularizing...

Johngas: Circularized.

MC: Your orbital path shows atmosphere skimming. Please raise your periapsis by 2 km at least.

Johngas: Rodger.

Gromoslaw: How many missions haf you been on so far?

Johngas: This is my first time piloting the shuttle. Burning.

Johngas: We are clear. Fuel depleted in ascent stage.

Johngas: Decoupling ascent stage and activating nuclear stage.

Johngas: MC, confirmation of interception burn?

MC: Uploaded to B9k now.

B9k: Interception in a few hours. Everyone might want to rest- we might be here a while...

************

I hope everyone enjoyed the chapter! Next one will be next weekend.

Oh, and if you want the differential wings...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64606-wip-Differential-Sails

I really like these. I have no idea why SasquatchM would not make them more public releases, but hey- I found them, so they work.

(I was going to have Solar sails be used at one point, but I cannot seem to find the minimum files necessary to make the part work. Oh well.

Write down whatever is on your mind, and know I read all of them.

I have this set up so I get emails whenever something is posted.

So yes, cziken20, I know what you deleted.
